name: Tamagotchi no Narikiri Challenge
description:
'Tamagotchi no Narikiri Challenge' (たまごっちのなりきりチャレンジ) is a Tamagotchi game developed by Dimps Corporation for the Nintendo DS. It was released only in Japan on November 11th, 2010. While being stylized after the 'Tamagotchi!' animation series, it is the seventh and second-to-last Tamagotchi entry made for the DS. It is the sequel to 'Tamagotchi no Narikiri Channel'.

Players can choose from Mametchi, Lovelitchi and Melodytchi to play as the protagonist in this school of far-flung dreams. Each class will be specially catered towards the character you play as. With over 20 potential classes, pass the baton to your teammate to complete an array of tasks- each classroom having 3 remarkable, unique minigames!

Here in 'Challenge Town', your aim is to attend all possible classes, whilst also trying your hand at the increasing difficulties. However, be mindful of your teammate, as they may feel burnt out with every activity they participate in. Treat them to restaurants and leisure time around town, and keep track of the notes you put in their 'Tamabook' to re-energize them. Reach for the stars, and come out of the academy with full marks!
